All Implemented Interfaces:
com.guidewire.pl.system.database.impl.IQueryBeanResultInternal<V>, com.guidewire.pl.system.database.impl.IQueryResultInternal<V,V>, com.guidewire.pl.system.database.IQueryBeanResultWithSummary<V,QueryRow>, com.guidewire.pl.system.database.IWrappedQueryResult<V,V>, IQueryBeanResult<V>, IQueryResult<V,V>, IQueryResultSet<V>, Serializable, Iterable<V>
public class CCQueryBeanResultWithSummary<V extends Bean> extends QueryBeanResultWithSummary<V,QueryRow>
This is a copy of StandardQueryBeanResultWithSummary, but with the added ability to hide and show the sum row.
Author:
tmcleskey
